concept.title: Reporting stylesheet issues and improvements
concept.shortdesc: You can request feature improvements and bug fixes on the stylesheet. Join the #tech-stylesheet Slack channel or write an email describing your request.

conbody.p: When reporting a bug, provide the following information:

ul.li: A brief description of the problem
The DITA-OT error message, if encountered. (you can send the full DITA-OT log).
Pointer to a DITAMAP and DITA topic showcasing the problem.
The git repository and branch name containing the DITA sources.
If the PDF build fails, also send the topic.fo file located in the temp directory.

conbody.p: When requesting a feature / improvement, provide the following information:

ul.li: Pointer to a DITAMAP / DITA topic where the improvement need can be observed in context.
